languages.text: "Машинные духи сих священных устройств требуют ритуала калибровки. После этого они готовы будут послужить вам".
"The machine spirits of these sacred devices demand a rite of calibration. Once it is performed, they will be willing to serve you."
languages.original_text: "Машинные духи сих священных устройств требуют ритуала калибровки. После этого они готовы будут послужить вам".

traits.locale_text: "The machine spirits of these sacred devices demand a rite of calibration. Once it is performed, they will be willing to serve you."
"The machine spirits of these sacred devices demand a rite of calibration. Once it is performed, they will be willing to serve you."
"The machine spirits of these sacred devices demand a rite of calibration. Once it is performed, they will be willing to serve you."
"The machine spirits of these sacred devices demand a rite of calibration. Once it is performed, they will be willing to serve you."
"The machine spirits of these sacred devices demand a rite of calibration. Once it is performed, they will be willing to serve you."

languages.text: “这些神圣装置的机魂需要进行校准仪式。仪式完成后，它们就会愿意为你服务。”
languages.original_text: "The machine spirits of these sacred devices demand a rite of calibration. Once it is performed, they will be willing to serve you."

traits.locale_text: “这些神圣装置的机魂需要进行校准仪式。仪式完成后，它们就会愿意为你服务。”

languages.text: « Les esprits de la machine de ces appareils sacrés exigent un rite de calibrage. Ensuite, ils seront disposés à vous servir. »
languages.original_text: "The machine spirits of these sacred devices demand a rite of calibration. Once it is performed, they will be willing to serve you."

traits.locale_text: « Les esprits de la machine de ces appareils sacrés exigent un rite de calibrage. Ensuite, ils seront disposés à vous servir. »

languages.text: 「この聖なる装置の機械精霊は、調整の儀式を要求しています。儀式が終わり次第、喜んで陛下に仕えるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The machine spirits of these sacred devices demand a rite of calibration. Once it is performed, they will be willing to serve you."

traits.locale_text: 「この聖なる装置の機械精霊は、調整の儀式を要求しています。儀式が終わり次第、喜んで陛下に仕えるでしょう」

languages.text: «Los espíritus máquina de estos dispositivos sagrados exigen un rito de calibración. Una vez celebrado, estarán dispuestos a servirle».
languages.original_text: "The machine spirits of these sacred devices demand a rite of calibration. Once it is performed, they will be willing to serve you."

traits.locale_text: «Los espíritus máquina de estos dispositivos sagrados exigen un rito de calibración. Una vez celebrado, estarán dispuestos a servirle».

languages.text: "Die Maschinengeister dieser heiligen Geräte verlangen einen Ritus der Kalibrierung. Sobald er ausgeführt wurde, sind sie bereit, Euch zu dienen."
languages.original_text: "The machine spirits of these sacred devices demand a rite of calibration. Once it is performed, they will be willing to serve you."

traits.locale_text: "Die Maschinengeister dieser heiligen Geräte verlangen einen Ritus der Kalibrierung. Sobald er ausgeführt wurde, sind sie bereit, Euch zu dienen."

languages.text: "Bu kutsal cihazların makine ruhları, kalibrasyon ayini talep etmekte. Ayin gerçekleştiğinde hizmet etmeye istekli olacaklar."
languages.original_text: "The machine spirits of these sacred devices demand a rite of calibration. Once it is performed, they will be willing to serve you."
